DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether substance abuse treatment design specifically drug-dependent woman offender provide good outcome standard drug court treatment ( mixed-gender program ) .
DOC.detailed_description: In five-year study , total 300 woman enter court-referred treatment throughout Los Angeles County agree participate study randomly assign women-focused mixed-gender outpatient treatment program . The study assess impact women-focused substance abuse treatment use outcome measure include recidivism , substance abuse relapse , social adjustment ( e.g. , employment , parent behavior , psychological improvement , HIV risk reduction behavior ) , compare impact traditional mixed-gender program . Assessments occur baseline 1 month , 12 month , 24 month admission .
DOC.criteria: Drug court participant At least eighteen ( 18 ) year old Have three prior nonviolent , nondrug felony conviction Do current charge drive influence alcohol drug charge sale transportation drug Not capable give informed consent
